title: Local Kubernetes Deployment
summary: Successfully fixed frontend TypeScript errors and prepared Helm charts, but Docker/Minikube deployment failed due to Docker daemon issues.

completed_tasks.description: Verified Qwen provider connectivity and system readiness
Analyzed and fixed frontend TypeScript errors (verifyJWT function)
Created JWT utility functions and updated imports
Confirmed Helm charts exist for frontend and backend

failed_tasks.reason: System resource issues - Bus error (core dumped)

issues.impact: Cannot build images or deploy to Minikube

recommendations: Verify Docker daemon is running properly
Retry Docker builds after resolving Docker issues
Deploy to Minikube after Docker is operational
